tool.name: Cut header
tool.description: and extract time series from a tabular dataset
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**TIP:** If your data is not TAB delimited, use *Text Manipulation->Convert*
-----
This tool extracts only the time series from a tabular file with header.
**Example**
- Input file must be tabular (separated by tabs) and well structured like::
id a b c d id1 1 9 2 0 id2 5 2 4 2 id3 2 3 5 1
- Output::
1 9 2 0 5 2 4 2 2 3 5 1
